Name: Rain or Shine
Ingredients: 45 ml Bacardi Carta Blanca Superior White Rum
Instructions: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into glass filled with crushed ice.
History: Created for Bacardí Legacy 2017 by Orman Bag-ao at Long Bar, Raffles and Fairmont Hotel Makati in Manila, Philippines.
Nutrition: One serving of Rain or Shine contains 148 calories
